\[\begin{tikzcd}
	\ell \\
	&& {k''} \\
	&&& p &&&& {k'} \\
	\\
	&&& k && c && {c'}
	\arrow["f"', from=5-6, to=5-8]
	\arrow["{h_{c}}"', from=5-4, to=5-6]
	\arrow["{h_{c'}}", from=3-8, to=5-8]
	\arrow["{\kappa_{k}}"', curve={height=18pt}, dotted, from=1-1, to=5-4]
	\arrow["{\kappa_{k'}}", curve={height=-18pt}, dotted, from=1-1, to=3-8]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=5-4]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-8]
	\arrow["\lrcorner"{anchor=center, pos=0.125}, shift right, draw=none, from=3-4, to=5-8]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[curve={height=6pt}, dashed, from=2-3, to=5-4]
	\arrow[curve={height=-6pt}, dashed, from=2-3, to=3-8]
\end{tikzcd}\]
